REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f1127 reute u f BC-/BANKERS-TRUST-<BT>-R 04-13 0046

TEXT.TITLE: BANKERS TRUST <BT> RAISES BROKER LOAN RATE
TEXT.BODY: Bankers Trust Co said it is raising its broker loan rate to 7-1/2 pct from 7-1/4 pct, effective immediately. U.S. Trust Co, the only other bank to publicize its broker rate, was already posting 7-1/2 pct. Reuter
